body.name: Dr. Squatch Fresh Falls Shampoo + Conditioner Hair Bundle
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 12 hrs 31 mins
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 12 hrs 31 mins
features: CLEANSE AND CONDITION your hair and scalp with our potent shampoo and conditioner 2-pack featuring Mother Nature’s finest ingredients like Jojoba Oil, Oat Protein, Shea Butter, and Avocado oil for silky smooth hair and a soothed scalp.
FRESH, MANLY SCENTS - Maintain your mane with the energizing scent of Fresh Falls.
NO HARMFUL INGREDIENTS - Our products are 98-100% natural in origin and we never use harsh chemicals or synthetics like parabens, sulfates, phthalates, or silicones.
NATURALLY-DERIVED FRAGRANCES - Nature smells awesome, so should you. That’s why we only use naturally-derived scents and avoid the synthetic fragrances that smell like a middle school locker room.
FORMULATED FOR MEN - You’ve got needs and we’ve got the goods. We develop our high-performance natural products specifically for the needs of men.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best feeling ever!
reviews.reviewText: Let me tell you, the Dr. Squatch Pine Tar Hair Care Kit totally surprised me! I mean, I usually just grab whatever's on sale at the store, but this stuff is next level. First off, the smell? Amazing. It's like a walk in the woods every time I shower.But more importantly, it actually works wonders on my hair. The shampoo isn't harsh like some others I've tried, and my scalp feels so clean without that dry, stripped feeling. And the conditioner? It's like a secret weapon against tangles. My hair's never been easier to manage.What I really appreciate is that it's made with natural ingredients. I mean, that's cool, right? And the packaging, it looks really nice and doesn't feel like it's going to fall apart after a week.I'm not usually big on writing reviews, but this kit? It's worth it. It's like upgrading your hair care routine to a whole new level without breaking the bank. I'll definitely be sticking with Dr. Squatch from now on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best scent and best one from the doc
reviews.reviewText: To fully get the fresh falls smoothness that the brand promotes, I recommend letting the conditioner last on your hair for at least 2 minutes or more when you’re in the shower. This way, after rinsing it off and coming out to dry, you’ll slowly feel the hair softening. It smells great and feels great. At first, after applying the conditioner and letting it last, you feel a cooling or burning feeling but it’s the ingredients doing their stuff. Just a heads up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An Energizing Shower Experience Like No Other!
reviews.reviewText: I've always been a fan of Dr. Squatch's grooming products, so when I saw the Citrus & Cypress Men's Shampoo + Conditioner Hair Bundle, I knew I had to try it. Let me tell you, this bundle did not disappoint!From the moment I opened the bottle, I was greeted by a burst of invigorating citrus and earthy cypress scents that instantly transported me to a serene forest. The natural fragrance is a game-changer in the shower; it wakes up your senses and makes you feel refreshed and revitalized.What truly sets this product apart is its performance. The shampoo and conditioner work in perfect harmony to clean and nourish your hair, leaving it feeling incredibly soft and looking healthy. No more dealing with dry, lackluster hair!The lather is rich and luxurious, and you only need a small amount for a full, satisfying wash. Plus, it rinses out easily, so you're not left with any residue or heaviness. This bundle has made my morning routine quicker and more enjoyable.But what's even better is that Dr. Squatch is committed to using natural ingredients that are great for your hair. No sulfates, parabens, or harsh chemicals - just pure goodness. I've noticed a significant improvement in the overall health and manageability of my hair since I started using this shampoo and conditioner.It's also worth mentioning that the packaging is not only stylish but eco-friendly too, which aligns perfectly with my values.In conclusion, Dr. Squatch's Citrus & Cypress Men's Shampoo + Conditioner Hair Bundle is a game-changer in the world of men's grooming. It provides an unbeatable combination of aromatic delight, superior performance, and natural ingredients. Treat yourself to an energizing shower experience like no other - your hair will thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Overpriced on Amazon and slightly misleading, but it works.
reviews.reviewText: First off- if you’re hell bent on buying this do it through their website, it’s significantly cheaper. I’ve used many of Dr. Squatch’s products in the past, and have used their shampoo/conditioner dozens of times. They push the whole “natural” thing a lot as a way to drive gullible customers, but there’s a reason most soaps and shampoo from brands like P&G use unnatural ingredients made in a lab- because it’s a helluva lot more effective and efficient than natural products. It has absolutely nothing to do with cutting costs like this brand claims. That being said- if you’re looking for natural products due to allergy or some other reason, these are some of the best money can buy. Fresh Falls is the best scent from them imo and your hair will smell great, until you leave the shower that is, lol. Despite what they claim, smells don’t stick around, especially when it comes to their body washes.Unless you’re going into cold to freezing temperatures that’ll make it more potent, don’t expect to be catching a whiff of your hair throughout the day.Only way I could recommend this to someone is if they’re trying to lead a “natural lifestyle” and cutting out products made by big pharmaceutical companies. Which is an incredibly stupid idea in itself, but people will be people. Chemicals are our friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A great shampoo/conditioner combo. Purchased after watching YouTube ads and was pleasantly surprised with the quality.
Questo è l’unico sapone che riesco a usare, dato che è l’unico naturale senza chimici e aggiuntivi certificato. 5 stelle
I recieved a shampoo and a conditioner and there where both expired for more than five months.

Do 5 stelle perché il prodotto in sé fa quello che deve fare . Un particolare profumo e per chi come me , ha una cute grassa , tende ad asciugare molto . Parere personale però , uno shampo e balsamo a 50 eurini e passa , anche no .... Cerco una scusa per il prezzo , probabile per via delle tasse , dato che parliamo di qualcosa che viene dall'America
